text: Angélique is a 2013 French costume drama and adventure film loosely based on the 1956 novel Angélique, the Marquise of the Angels by Anne Golon. ==Cast== * Nora Arnezeder as Angélique ** Salomé Degeer as young Angélique * Gérard Lanvin as Count Joffrey de Peyrac * Tomer Sisley as Marquis de Plessis- Bellière * Mathieu Kassovitz as Nicolas Merlot * Simon Abkarian as the lawyer François Desgrez * Matthieu Boujenah as Marquis d'Andijos * David Kross as Louis XIV * Patrick Descamps as the archbishop of Toulouse * Jean-Louis Sbille as the priest ==References== ==External links== * *Reviews of Angélique by film critics from different countries *Official website of Angélique in French *Official website of Angélique in English Category:2010s historical adventure films Category:French historical adventure films Category:Films based on French novels Category:Films based on adaptations Category:French films Category:Films set in the 1650s Category:Films set in the 1660s Category:French film remakes Category:Films shot in Austria Category:Films shot in Belgium Category:Films shot in the Czech Republic Category:Films scored by Nathaniel Méchaly Category:Films directed by Ariel Zeitoun Category:Period action films
title: Angélique (film)
